passive_keystone_resolute_technique.name: Resolute Technique
passive_keystone_resolute_technique.flavour_text: Great tacticians learn that consistency often trumps potential.

passive_keystone_giants_blood.name: Giant's Blood
passive_keystone_giants_blood.flavour_text: The Titans did not vanish from this world. Their might lives on - in you.

passive_keystone_unwavering_stance_.name: Unwavering Stance
passive_keystone_unwavering_stance_.flavour_text:
Stand your ground, child, keep your senses.
The pain is fleeting, but victory is forever.

passive_keystone_avatar_of_fire.name: Avatar of Fire
passive_keystone_avatar_of_fire.flavour_text: "In my dreams I see a great warrior, his skin scorched black, his fists aflame."

passive_keystone_blood_magic.name: Blood Magic
passive_keystone_blood_magic.flavour_text: Lay open your veins, and draw power from your own spilled life.

passive_keystone_zealots_oath.name: Zealot's Oath
passive_keystone_zealots_oath.flavour_text: Tear my flesh and splinter my bones. You will never break my spirit.

passive_keystone_ancestral_bond.name: Ancestral Bond
passive_keystone_ancestral_bond.flavour_text:
A wooden construct, mute and blind.
But fear the wrath of shackled mind.

passive_keystone_pain_attunement.name: Pain Attunement
passive_keystone_pain_attunement.flavour_text:
Embrace the pain, drink it in.
Your enemies will know your agony tenfold.

passive_keystone_chaos_inoculation.name: Chaos Inoculation
passive_keystone_chaos_inoculation.flavour_text: Give up everything in pursuit of greatness - even life itself.

passive_keystone_eldritch_battery__.name: Eldritch Battery
passive_keystone_eldritch_battery__.flavour_text:
What need have I for defence when my enemies
are reduced to ash and splinters?

passive_keystone_mind_over_matter.name: Mind Over Matter
passive_keystone_mind_over_matter.flavour_text: While the mind endures, so too will the body.

passive_keystone_whispers_of_doom.name: Whispers of Doom
passive_keystone_whispers_of_doom.flavour_text: Your grandchildren will awaken screaming in memory of what I utter today.

passive_keystone_necromantic_talisman.name: Necromantic Talisman
passive_keystone_necromantic_talisman.flavour_text: I give you everything, my pets. Do not disappoint me.

passive_keystone_conduit.name: Conduit
passive_keystone_conduit.flavour_text: To me, brave companions! Feel my radiance flow through you!

passive_keystone_ghost_reaver_.name: [UNUSED] Ghost Reaver
passive_keystone_ghost_reaver_.flavour_text: I will wear your ghost, and you will die twice: against me, and for me.

passive_keystone_resonance.name: Resonance
passive_keystone_resonance.flavour_text: The notes may change, but the song remains the same.

passive_keystone_eternal_youth.name: Eternal Youth
passive_keystone_eternal_youth.flavour_text: Burn the spirit to vitalise the flesh.

passive_keystone_acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
passive_keystone_acrobatics.flavour_text: Light and unadorned, like wind on water, you will be.

passive_keystone_dance_with_death.name: Dance with Death
passive_keystone_dance_with_death.flavour_text: You circle the black scorpion with enmity, daring it time and again.

passive_keystone_heartstopper.name: Heartstopper
passive_keystone_heartstopper.flavour_text: Skip a beat, hold your breath. Too slow a poison, only death.

passive_keystone_oasis.name: Oasis
passive_keystone_oasis.flavour_text: The fewer there are, the less you have to share.

passive_keystone_vaal_pact.name: Vaal Pact
passive_keystone_vaal_pact.flavour_text:
My ancestral pact was sealed. Forevermore, I would gain sustenance
only from the ravaged flesh of my enemies.

passive_keystone_iron_reflexes_.name: Iron Reflexes
passive_keystone_iron_reflexes_.flavour_text: Why should I dodge blows that I do not fear?

passive_keystone_glancing_blows_.name: Glancing Blows
passive_keystone_glancing_blows_.flavour_text: Utter trust in your defence unleashes ultimate potential.

passive_keystone_elemental_equilibrium.name: Elemental Equilibrium
passive_keystone_elemental_equilibrium.flavour_text: Balance is good in all things, but especially in the realm of magic.

passive_keystone_bulwark.name: Bulwark
passive_keystone_bulwark.flavour_text: In battle, certainty is worth a little pain.

AtlasGenericKeystone1.name: Corrupted Infusion
AtlasGenericKeystone1.flavour_text: We seek to cleanse Corruption, not intensify it, but there may be merit to a paradoxical strategy.

AtlasGenericKeystone2.name: Unstable Energies
AtlasGenericKeystone2.flavour_text: Overcharge the machine at your own risk.

AtlasDeliriumNotable2.name: Would you like to see my face?

AtlasDeliriumNotable3.name: You can't just wake up from this one.

AtlasDeliriumNotable7_.name: It's not real, it's not real!
